wikipedia_page.main: Cameron "Cammie" Boyle was a Scottish international rugby union player.He was capped for Scotland three times in 1963. He also played for London Scottish FC.His brother Alasdair Boyle was also capped for Scotland.

response: His brother Cameron Boyle was also capped for Scotland.
